body.name: WinZo Elongated Black One Piece Toilet Standard 12" Rough-in Dual Flush 1.1/1.6 GPF Water Saving For Modern Bathroom
features: Elegant design with matte black color will create your master bathroom with more modern feeling.
Dual Flush for Water saving: The toilet comes with water consumption dual flush 1.1/1.6GPF(Average 1.28gpf) ,you could select the flushing capacity based on your selection.
Elongated Toilet bowl with longer space for sitting. More comfortable for most of adults. Standard elongated shape, easier to get replacement seat in local plumbing store.

Durable UF heavy duty soft closing toilet seat included. The seat is made of UF heavy duty material which is more durable, more sanitary and longer-lasting than painted wood or ordinary plastic seats.Solid color throughout ,it won't yellow and fade, and it will remain the same as the new ones after a few years of use.

Toilet bowl with two nozzles flushing holes instead of transitional rim holes : The upgraded bowl flushing design creates a powerful and fast flushing power with less water to clean the entire bowl surface completely.High performance ,easier to clean.
FLUSH TESTED: All toilets have been done the test of leaking & flushing function to ensure optimal performance and no leaking issue before shipping.
Standard 12"rough-in. Please check the distance between wall to the center of flange hoe to determine if you need toilet with 12"rough-in or 10" rough-in.
body.description: Specification Flush type: Dual Flush 1.1/1.6 GPF (1.28 GPF average) (Top push button) Material:Vitreous China Rough-in: Standard 12" Bowl Shape: Elongated Overall length(Front to back): 26.5 inches Overall width(side to side):14.5 inches Overall Height(Top to floor): 30 inches Seat height:16 inches (Floor to seat) Color:Matte black

productInformation.value: ‎Toilet fill valve & flush valve, Wax ring and fixing bolts, Elongated toilet, soft closing toilet seat

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WinZo Elongated One Piece Toilet With Dual Flush 1.1/1.6 GPF WZ5022B Matte Black Features Dual Flush for both optional Double Cyclone Flush System in the bowl Elongated Bowl with expended space Standard Height for children and most adults CUPC, WaterSense, CEC Compliant MaP 1000g Packages Included 1 x Toilet 1 x Soft close seat 1 x Wax ring 2 x Floor mounting bolts 2 x plastic covers Specification Flush type: Dual Flush 1.1/1.6 GPF (1.28 GPF average) (Top push button) Material:Vitreous China Rough-in: Standard 12" Bowl Shape: Elongated Overall length(Front to back): 26.5 inches Overall width(side to side):14.5 inches Overall Height(Top to floor): 30 inches Seat height:16 inches (Floor to seat) Color:Matte black

More Features of WinZo Modern One Piece Toilet WZ5022 Series White Or black color Easy to Clean Surface Full Skirted trapway design and self-clean glaze surface creates a sleek look and makes cleaning easier. Tornado Double Cyclone Flush System Flushing by double nozzles holes instead of traditional rim holes, with more efficiently and powerful flushing function,easier cleaning. Premium Quality Fill & Flush Valve The fill &flush valves are made of superior ABS material, more durable.

Soft Close Seat Included Soft close lid close quietly and slowly without slamming Top mounted installation,Easy to tighten and adjustment, Never Loosen toilet seat Quick Release Hinges Simply press the two buttons and lift straight up. Stainless Steel screws make seat stays securely fasten to the bowl Easy To Clean You can clean the areas that hard to reach, which keeping your bathroom fresh and comfortable. Toilet seat with quality bumpers. NON-SLIP BUMPERS: The non-slip toilet seat bumpers keep the seat from moving or shifting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently change the bathroom and this toilet is not staying stable on my new marble floor. The contractor has been back three times to install this toilet and unfortunately there is still a slight rock when a person sit down

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars do far we love it
reviews.reviewText: Love the flat black color. My wife likes the seat height. Not to tall. Love the modern look.Trying to line up the holes and tighten the nut on the base screws is a pain. Love the soft close seat and instulation. instruction suck.
